content: needle a é m 2 a design by ciara ní reachtnín special stitches and instructions c7f sl 3 sts to cn hold in front k3 p1 then k3 from cn c7b sl 4 sts to cn and hold in back k3 then p1 k3 from cn c4f sl 2 sts to cn hold in front k2 then k2 from cn c4b sl 2 sts to cn and hold in back k2 then k2 from cn german short row sr i use the german method of creating short row in the cardigan please use whichever method you prefer if you are working the wrap and turn work this at the turning point and ignore the sr instruction at the start of the following row and then work the wrapped stitches together with their wraps as you come to them sr bring yarn to the front slip_stitch p-wise and bring yarn up over and back to pull on the slipped stitch until it slides around to show two legs keeping the yarn at the back in order to k next st while keeping the gauge on the ws keep yarn at the front to purl next st continue in patt when working the stitch the next time you meet it work the double stitch i e the two legs as one stitch pattern notes o this cardigan is worked flat from the top down o two braided cables adorn the front while a statement cable cascades from the shawl collar down the back o the decorative cables and ribbing flow into the twisted rib border o as the raglan yoke increases stitches are set aside for the sleeves o once the main body of the cardi is completed a twisted rib shawl collar is added incorporating the decorative ribbing at the neck o the sleeves are then worked in st st in the round and gently shaped n a g before finishing in a twisted rib cuff
